DOC.brief_summary: This 6 week study assess effect BI 671800 patient asthma . It double blind , parallel arm trial test safety efficacy BI 671800 . The main objective ass effect lung function . The study also provide data pharmacokinetics BI 671800 .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Signed informed consent consistent ICHGCP 2 . Three month history reversible ( 12 % 200 mL force expiratory volume one second FEV1 ) asthma ( accord GINA ) follow spirometry randomisation : FEV1 60 % 85 % . 3 . Stable inhaled corticosteroid ( iCS ) dose 3 month prior screen . 4 . Diagnosis asthma prior 40 year . 5 . Asthma Control Questionnaire ( ACQ ) least 1.5 randomisation . 6 . Male female 18 65 year . 7 . Nonsmokers exsmokers ( less 10 pack year history ) negative cotinine screen . 8 . Able perform pulmonary function test . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Significant disease asthma allergic rhinitis . 2 . Hepatic transaminase total bilirubin great 1.5 ULN . 3 . Hospitalisation asthma exacerbation asthma related intubation within 3 month . 4 . Uncontrolled asthma iCS + controller . 5 . Respiratory tract infection exacerbation within 4 week . 6 . FEV1 le 40 % , 12 puff rescue salbutamol two consecutive day , asthma exacerbation runin period . 7 . Participation another interventional study . 8 . Pregnant nursing woman . 9 . Women child bear potential use appropriate method birth control define study protocol .
